title: Beats by Dr Dre
content: has launched a 'Decade Collection' comprised of the Beats Studio3 Wireless over-ear headphones, Beats Solo3 Wireless on-ear headphones, BeatsX wireless earphones, Powerbeats3 Wireless earphones and urBeats3 earphones, all of which have exterior designs that feature red accents over a matte black background... and, of course, the familiar lower-case 'b'.    Despite gaining critical attention for some models, which some reviewers claimed exhibited prominent bass and treble response, and for their high retail prices in relation to similarly-styled products, Beats gained a 64 per cent market share in the USA for headphones priced higher than $100 (according to research by The NPD Group, Inc.) The company has also gained attention for its legal battles with both Bose and Monster.    For more information, contact Beats by Dr Dre
